title: Test
description: Schema for a single test within a test set

name.description: Unique name of the test within its test set

inputs.description: Dictionary of input values (keys are input variable names)

.*.description: Input value (must match the format and constraints of the corresponding variable)

outputs.description: Dictionary of expected output values with precision (keys are output variable names)

precision.description: Number of decimal places for DOUBLE types (optional for non-DOUBLE)
